com.xpert.security

Class ActiveDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xpert.security.ActiveDirectory

  • public class ActiveDirectory
extends Object
    Provides static methods to authenticate users, change passwords, etc. Its based on this work: http://www.javaxt.com/Tutorials/Windows/How_to_Authenticate_Users_with_Active_Directory

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ActiveDirectory.User
      Used to represent a User in Active Directory
